name: @gnani.ai/web-voice-hook
description: React hook for real-time bidirectional WebSocket voice (STT/TTS)

scripts.release:patch: pnpm build && git add . && git commit -m "build: v$npm_package_version" || true && pnpm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: pnpm build && git add . && git commit -m "build: v$npm_package_version" || true && pnpm version major && git push && git push --tags
